UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of omwaprin, a new member of the waprin family of snake venom proteins.
Literature.Author: Nair DG, Fry BG, Alewood P, Kumar PP, Kini RM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus megaterium IAM 13418T(MIC=560.2µg/ml),Staphylococcus warneri AJ276810(MIC=1700µg/ml),Bacillus thuringiensis WS2617(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Streptomyces clavuligerus NRRL 3585(no activity data),Escherichia coli BL21(no activity data),Agrobacterium tumefaciens GV3101(no activity data)
